alfa wikirana wala adangu wenne ithamath semin gaman karana barin wadi saha godak widyuth aaropanayak sahitha anshu.me karanaya nisama alfa wikirana wala winiwidayame hakiyawa ithamath awamayi.ee kiyanne apita thuni kadadasiyakin wunath puluwan alfa wikirana wala gaman manga awahira karala eewa gaman kirima nawathwanna.bita wikiranawala anthargatha wenne wegayen gaman karana, aaropana sahitha sahallu anshu.ee kiyanne bita wikirana wala winiwidayame hakiyawa alfa wikirana walata wada sapekshawa wadiyi.ee nisa bita wikirana wala gaman manga nawathwimata nam sapekshawa tharamak ghanakama athi badhakayak bhawitha karanna wenawa.gama wikirana kiyanne aaropanayak rahitha wegayen gaman karana anshu.ee nisa mewaye winiwidayame hakiyawa ihalayi.mokada mewata aaropanayak nathi nisa wenath wasthu samanga antharkriya kirimak widyuth washayen siddha wenne naha.gama wikirana nawathwanna nam apita tikak ghanakama athi eeyam wage loha kuttiyak oona wenawa.
dasa masak kusa dara daruwan melowata bihi kala ammatath nowindina duk winda daruwan poshanaya kala thaththatath awasanaye himi wanne wadihiti niwasayada?

krikat waladi kasiye wasiya salaka balana se, eda dawase lak eka jak walatath awashyaya.bas ekata naga, honda kallak lagata gos hitagath pasu, kella eelanga holt eken basiya haka.nathnam kohe ho sitina apathayek nagita ee kella sit eke idagannawa wani awasanawantha thaththwayanta muhuna dimata sidu wiya haka.eheth tos eka paradima yanu mach eka paradimama nowe.ee sandaha ekspiriyans ekath, hakiyawath oonaya.hondata padamwu pich ekakadi lakunu gahanna lesi wagema, anta parawal nam, jak ekakata allaganima itha lehesiya.hondata anda palandagath, opis kallak unath, shep eke langata gos, yantham tach kara thaththwaya bala, wadeta entar wi, past trak pich ekakin uwath hondata lakunu raskala haka.ee lewal tharamata wada podi iskole kellan ho podi gahanu daruwanta jak gasima nam patta waradiya.thawamath hadagena yana pich ekaka krikat gasa pich eka chora kalayuthu natha.kisima deyak notherena ewan daruwekuta jak gasima yanu, jak osthar kenek wu mamada anumatha nokarana pahath pele wadaki.ehenam tho opis kellantayi antilatayi jak gahanne, thota ammala, sahodariyo naddayi ubala asanu atha.ehenam ithin ubalata kasada bandala, lamayi hadannatath bariya.eeth kage ho duwek, sahodariyak thamaya.
